fields.title: Underweight Plan
fields.text: Increase calorie intake with nutrient-dense foods. Include healthy fats, complex carbs, and protein.

fields.title: Normal BMI Plan
fields.text: Maintain a balanced diet: vegetables, fruits, whole grains, lean proteins, and healthy fats.

fields.title: Overweight Plan
fields.text: Moderate calorie deficit. Emphasize fiber, lean protein, and reduce refined sugars.

fields.title: Obesity Plan
fields.text: Structured calorie control with medical guidance if needed. Focus on low-glycemic foods and regular activity.
